name: Cyber Cats
description:
Global Game Jam 2018 entry. 

An old-school split-screen shooter upper! up to four players split screen, uses controllers or keyboard (WASD ZX and Arrows + NM). Pay attention to your mission, at the bottom of the screen!! If you do the best, you'll get bonus power.

  Kinda half-baked. 

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/pro-controller

Full-screen with Alt+Enter. Alt+F4 to quit.
